name: KARVTheValley’sNewsAuthority
0:
”Alexa, play k. a. r. v.”
”Alexa, open k. a. r. v.”
”Alexa, start k. a. r. v.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. a. r. v.
des:
KARV is the Valley’s News Authority! Listen to KARV on your Amazon device(s)! 

Once you've enabled the skill, saying "Alexa, OPEN K. A. R. V." gets you right in.

You may be asked to provide your zip code associated with your device when enabling this skill, this is 100% optional. Your zip code is only used to show this Radio Station where listeners are generally located.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
